title: Pav Bhaji Masala Veg Biryani 😋 || Weekend Spl
content:
Ingredients: Basmati Rice - 1 cup Veggies: 🥕 Carrots - 1/4 cup Beans - 1/2 cup Cauliflower  - chopped - 1 cup Potato 🥔- peeled off - diced - 1 cup Onion - finely sliced - 1 cup Tomatoes 🍅- 3 medium size - diced - 1 cup Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 1 tea spoon Bay leaf 🍃 - 1 Green chillies - 8 Garlic - Cloves - 10 Ginger-Garlic paste - 1 tb sp Oil - 2 tb sp Pav Bhaji Masala Powder - 1 teaspoon Pav Bhaji Masala Powder Red chilli powder - 1 teaspoon Cumin/ Jeera powder- 1 tea spoon Coriander powder - 1 tea spoon Salt - as per taste Raita: Curd/ yogurt - 1 cup Finely chopped onion - 1/2 cup Cumin/ Jeera powder- 1/4 teaspoon Pepper powder - 1/4 tea spoon Salt - To taste Procedure:
  • Wash Basmati rice twice and keep aside
  • Make green chillies+Garlic paste and keep aside
  • Heat frying pan on medium to high heat
  • Add oil , Jeera/cumin seeds let them fry add biryani leaf and sliced onion in the same pan
  • Saute for one minute
  • Add green chillies + Garlic paste  and Ginger-Garlic paste
  • Saute for one minute
  • Add diced tomatoes and Saute
  • Close with lid and cook one minute
  • Add Veggies: carrots, beans and potatoes
  • Saute for 1 min
  • Next add red chilly powder, coriander powder, cumin/ jeera powder and pav Bhaji masala powder Mix them well and saute for one to two minutes
  • Add 2 tb sp of water and add chopped cauliflower
  • Saute them and Close with lid
  • Cook for one minute
  • Next add washed rice, salt and mix them well
  • Close lid for one minute
  • Ratio of water to this biryani (1 cup basmati rice - 1 and 1/2 cups of water )
  • Close with lid and cook 10 to 15 minutes in low to medium heat
  • Pav Bhaji Masala Veg Biryani is ready to serve 😀
  • Weekend spl Recipe 😋
